channel.title: game loading freeze
channel.description:
Hi, i have recently downloaded black mesa and it seems it have a lot of loading error. First when i installed the game it start to process things after finishing the process loading appears and the game got frozen then i restarted the game the screen went black after a minute the main menu appeared i pressed new game and the game loading freezed at 6 bars
Please help me fix the game im dying to play it
